address.title: Address
address.description: Address of the contract, It can be a valid VFS path as well

msg.title: Message
msg.description: JSON which will be sent as execute message to the contract

codeId.title: Code Id
codeId.description: Code Id used to instantiate new ado. Use Ado Type unless you know what you are doing

oneOf.title: Code Id
oneOf.description: Code ID of the uploaded contract you want to use to instantiate the ado

oneOf.title: Ado Type
oneOf.description: Use ado type key added in our adodb for easy access. No need to remember code id

funds.title: Funds
funds.description: Funds you want to attach with this message

denom.title: Coin Denom
denom.description: Denom for coin. Only smallest units are accepted (eg ujunox)

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount to be used as fund
